about.description: xcube is a Python package for generating and exploiting data cubes powered by xarray, dask, and zarr. It has been designed in the context of Earth Observation data.
about.summary: xcube is a Python package for generating and exploiting data cubes powered by xarray, dask, and zarr

name: xcube
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}

package:
  name: xcube
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/dcs4cop/xcube/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 35a934429ff173b383203395ad4ad513c405a15bd5a6c2a319d4d8fa6816f116

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  entry_points:
    - xcube = xcube.cli.cli:main
    - xcube-gen = xcube.cli.gen:main
    - xcube-restime = xcube.cli.restime:main

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - affine >=2.2
    - click >=7.0
    - cmocean >=2.0
    - dask >=1.2
    - fiona >=1.8
    # - gdal >=2.4
    - matplotlib >=3.0
    - netcdf4 >=1.5.0
    - numba >=0.43
    - numpy >=1.16
    - pandas >=0.24
    - pillow >=6.0
    # - proj4 >=5.2
    - pyyaml >=5.1
    - rasterio >=1.0
    - s3fs >=0.2
    - scipy >=1.2
    - setuptools >=41.0
    - shapely >=1.6
    - tornado >=6.0
    - xarray >=0.12.3
    - zarr >=2.3.2
    - sphinx >=2.0.1

test:
  imports:
    - xcube
    - xcube.api
    - xcube.cli
    - xcube.util
    - xcube.webapi
  commands:
    - xcube --help

about:
  summary: "xcube is a Python package for generating and exploiting data cubes powered by xarray, dask, and zarr"
  home: https://github.com/dcs4cop/xcube
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: "xcube is a Python package for generating and exploiting data cubes powered by xarray, dask, and zarr. It
  has been designed in the context of Earth Observation data."
  doc_url: https://xcube.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/dcs4cop/xcube

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dzelge
    - forman
